title: Leighton's font only
content:
Can anyone please help me with this font? thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724100757/http:/typophile.com/files/image_118.jpg) | 327.31 KB |
author: Primehunter

comments.content:
Possibly a number of fonts might be close, but [Frutiger Ultra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724100757/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frutiger/?refby=bowfin) looks pretty close to me.

- Mike Yanega
